channel.title: Promenthium! 24/7 Online || No lagg || New || GiveAway!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://promenthium.com/banners/rune.gif[/img] [size=36]Join us on [color=green][url=http://www.promenthium.com]www.promenthium.com[/url][/color]![/size] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img841/986/bannerwwy.jpg[/img] [/center] [size=18]Webclient: [url=http://promenthium.com/webclient/]Promenthium - Webclient[/url][/size] [center][size=25]*Staff Spots*[/size] [size=21]-Currently: Open[/size][/center] -Bosses that are developed by developers of Promenthium. -Chinchompas and Dwarf's Multicannon -Max Uptimes, we are 99% online, and have weekly maintenances. -Olmost All skills 100% -Quests, miniquests, minigames, dungeons, caves, citys and much more that you can imagine. [size=21]Big Giveaway for the first *28* Players! Hurry up![/size] [center][size=18]giveaway Items[/size] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img109/9382/giveawayav.jpg[/img] [size=18]giveaway Items[/size][/center]
